title: Support income stats
body:
First off, I love the addition of stats. Probably the best addition to the game in a long time in my opinion. That said, as a support, why am I looking at trying to increase my CS per minute or my early CS advantage against the opposing support? It's fun trying to increase your grades across the board, but the wonky income stats as a support has me doing the wrong things simply for a higher grade. Could it be made so that support income stats can be linked to their AD's gold advantages?


EDIT: Here's a picture of exactly what I'm talking about since apparently there's confusion.

https://imgur.com/yKev7Lv


Nitpicky, I know, but if this was ironed out I think stats would be perfect. Thanks.

replies.body: Having a deficit on enchanters doesn't really matter because it takes the average of your champion.  All enchanters will have a deficit and you will average about the same deficit.  The problem comes when you don't take relic on champions who normally do.  Good examples are Taric taking coin and Blitz taking spellthief.

The problem comes in when if you want to improve that income stat beyond the average of your champion, you are stealing a creep more often to be "above average" in a 100% irrelevant stat for supports. Supports just shouldn't have to think about that stuff. Encourage supports to enable the AD's CS per minute and CS advantage. Do this by tracking the appropriate stats.

because you dont use targons, if your adc leaves you alone to defend the lane and goes mid then you increase your cs that way...but when I play supp and my adc leaves and no one defend the tower I have to do it.  I don't know why they leave the support to defend the lanes and all go mid I think it's stupid but in my elo it happens a lot.

It kind of sucks as a Taric main who uses {{item:3301}}  instead of {{item:3307}} .  My gold income grade average is really low in the stats because of this.

https://i.imgur.com/G605mEL.png
Amen. This is my point. You shouldn't have to favor an item over another simply to increase your Stats grade. Supports should be graded high for their ADC's CS advantage.

It gets really dumb when you look at gold income for my normal games.  599 to -269 for gold advantage is somehow a B+....seems legit

https://i.imgur.com/EyFw85j.png
Yep. You are performing very well. The irrelevant stats are just screwing over your grade. Demonstrates my point perfectly.

not so great of an idea:

it is true that most people don't like to play support for the reason that they don't get enough gold and are almost useless alone.
but having thier gold income linked to thier adc is a bad idea, if your adc sucks you can do nothing about it, and your opponent earns more gold, making the already garbage snowball meta more snowbally.

most non-suppoert players like to play pyke when they get autofilled cause that's what's missing in the support role, being able to make plays and TAKE kills.
if there was an item that shared the kill gold between the two like pyke's ult people will like the support role even more

Uhhhh what? I'm talking about the literal "Stats" screen. It tracks CS per minute and CS advantage vs the opposing support. Did I not say that exactly?


What I'm asking is that instead of tracking how many CS per minute you got vs the other support, track how your ADC did vs the opposing ADC. It seems like a no-brainer to me.
It makes you wonder what would happen if riot nerfed the funneling of gold from supports to ADCs.
it would make a snowball from ARAM turn into a huge Nunu snowball rolling down midlane with predator boots.
